title: Chunk
description: Describes a the location of a chunk.

fields.description: X index of the chunk. Note that each chunk is 16x16 blocks; this number is the starting block coordinate divided by 16.

fields.desciption: Z index of the chunk. Note that each chunk is 16x16 blocks; this number is the starting block coordinate divided by 16.
Index of the dimension where the chunk is located.
